page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA.
page.content: Although there is high unemployment in the area(see below) there is usually one member of a family lucky enough to have a job. Families without a job will still have some money (e.g. Social Security money) for essential provisions. Most men who are in employment work in factories.Many men travel to Coventry (8 miles away) to work.The largest employer in our area is Serling Metals Factory(1400 workers). Lorry driving is the next popular job. The majority of women in the area are housewives, although most who are in employment, work in clothing factories. 15.3% of the work force in Nuneaton are unemployed. There are 3893 men unemployed(17.2%) and 2077 women without a job(12.4%). These figures are above the national unemployment figures.(July 1985)
